sentences.english: Objective To set up a successful animal model of steroid-induced osteonecrosis.

sentences.english: Objective To make new approach of the interventional radiology in the treatment of ischemic necrosis of caput femoris in children.

sentences.english: In addition, the necrosis of spleen, bursa of Fabricius, thymus and convoluted tubular epithelia of kidney was seen.

sentences.english: Hydropic degeneration and focal necrosis can be found by microscope in the dosage groups.

sentences.english: Structures around the nerve was not seen damaged.

sentences.english: Finally, we found no association between the incidence of AVN and operation delay.

sentences.english: However, bisphosphonates may play a role in the development of osteonecrosis of the jaws.

sentences.english: The tumor tissue around anti-cancer agent bone cement presented necrosis on the pathological examination.
